visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include the monthly average temperatures for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray with specified margins for better spacing. The title and axis labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The data series represents the monthly average temperatures for a year, with the series name 'Temperature' and a custom color of tomato. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart presentation.
